forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High around 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 1C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 1C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near -5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 24F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 2C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 37F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the night. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the night. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 30%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 38F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low -3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 32F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 40F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 1C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 34F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
